legal_basis: visa officers must inform applicants if concerns relate to document veracity
decision_reasoning: officer questioned the authenticity of the experience letter, implying fraud
application_details: permanent residence application denied due to insufficient evidence of work experience
procedure_followed: judicial review application filed challenging the visa officer's decision based on procedural fairness
result_of_case: court allowed the judicial review, amending the case to include family members, and ordered redetermination
